text:
This is very interesting! Would very much like to do this!

I’ve experimented with this in the past (pre themes) I managed to add colours just to the text and I used <b> tags to make it easier to see the colour not ideal but it didn’t seem to want to take any background colour.

Keep us updated if you get any further using themes though!
Maybe if there’s a font character that was just a solid block you could use those
Sorry just saw your screenshot of this, That’s definitely gonna be the tricky bit! <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CLJJXGTC0/p1674740875973269?thread_ts=1674740517.536859&cid=CLJJXGTC0>
